overview: Now, you can experience the fist-flying action of bruising barroom brawls without leaving the confines of your home ... and risking arrest! This collection of catfights, bouncer knockouts and go-go dancers gone wild brings everything but the tequila shots right into your living room. Jaw-dropping footage set to a hard-hitting heavy-metal soundtrack brings the scene alive -- and your TV keeps it at a safe distance.
title: Barroom Babes & Brawls
